main.name: Muhammed Fatih Balin
main.description: I am a PhD student advised by Umit V. Catalyurek in Computational Science and Engineering at Georgia Tech. My research interests include high-performance computing, graph analytics, graph processing systems, streaming graph algorithms, and community detection. Recently, I have been working on a framework for multi-GPU Graph Convolutional Neural Network (GCN) training.

projects.title: SARMA
projects.category: SARMA (SpatiAl Rectilinear Matrix pArtitioning) is a template-based, header only, library for spatial rectilinear partitioning. The main goal of this library to introduce novel symmetric rectilinear partitioning algorithms.

projects.title: PathwayMapper
projects.category: Worked as a developer. PathwayMapper is a web based pathway curation tool for interactive creation, editing, and sharing of cancer pathways. The tool supports remote users to collaborate and concurrently modify pathways using ShareDB with built-in conflict resolution implemented as a ReactJS component.

projects.title: cBioPortal
projects.category: Worked as a developer. The cBioPortal for Cancer Genomics provides visualization, analysis, and download of large-scale cancer genomics data sets.
